---
id: QuerySingleOrder
title: 查询单个订单
sidebar_label: 查询单个订单
sidebar_position: 1
description: /spot/v4/order
---

**类型:** GET

**接口:** `/spot/v4/order`

### 限流规则

10次/秒/apikey

### 参数

| 参数名            | 类型   | 是否必填 | 默认值 | 描述     |
| --------------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | --------------- |
| `orderId`       | number | 否        |         | 订单ID        |
| `clientOrderId` | string | 否        |         | 客户端订单ID |

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
    "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
    "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
    "baseCurrency": "string",
    "quoteCurrency": "string",
    "side": "BUY",             // 订单方向：BUY（买入）, SELL（卖出）
    "type": "LIMIT",           // 订单类型：LIMIT（限价）, MARKET（市价）
```
